Title: A King Out Hunting Accidently Kills a Young Man
Medium: ink and pigments on laid paper
Description: On this folio from Walters manuscript W.622, a king out hunting accidentally kills a young man and offers to compensate his mother with his own life or a platter of gold.
Keywords: Islamic; Persian; Safavid; Book; Codex; Colophon; Illumination; Illustration; Manuscript; Iran; Central Asia; Literature -- Poetry

Creator: Amir Khusraw Dihlavi (died ca. 729 AH/AD 1328)
